roleset.name: colloquial; to nickel and dime someone
roleset.note: NICKEL-V NOTES: Frame file created by Arrick (from nickel.01-v)

example.name: nickle and dime
example.text: In fact they sort of nickeled and dimed him on not giving him a fair up or down vote on much less relevant points.
example.arg: on not giving him a fair up or down vote on much less relevant points.
